metadata.name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity Via GatherNetworkInfo.VBS
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the built-in script located in "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs". Which can be used to gather information about the target machine

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gathernetworkinfo.vbs')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the built-in script located in "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs". Which can be used to gather information about the target machine
